Event: At 16:00, Z was punched to death during a fight.\nHow did it happen?
To start with, Z got up
Then, he was busy at work
Then, he received a call from his neighbor\nwho saw a man broke into his house
Then, he had a fight with the robber
Then, during the fight, Z was punched to death
Then, a friend of Z called him, but never answered
Then, the friend decided to find Z
At last,\nZ was found dead in his house
